In England, in the seven days to 08 January, there were 958,774 new confirmed cases (1,695.4 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 01 January, there were 977,045 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 2% (18,271 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 13 January is 12,680,151 (22,422.8 cases per 100,000 population).
